skills.name: Organic Deconstruction
skills.blurb: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vel'Koz's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a ''Deconstruction'' [[stack]] to enemies hit for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. [[Basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and further applications refresh the duration.
The third stack consumes them all to deal {{as|{{pp|33 to 169}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{sti|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Vel'Koz's Champion ability apply a Deconstruction stack to enemies hit for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks on-hit and further applications refresh the duration.
The third stack consumes them all to deal 33undefined âˆ’ 169undefined (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus true damage.

skills.name: Plasma Fission
skills.blurb: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that collides with the first enemy hit, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration. ''Plasma Fission'' can be recast after {{fd|0.25}} seconds while the bolt is in flight, and does so automatically after the bolt reaches maximum range or collides with an enemy.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Vel'Koz''' splits the bolt in half {{tt|over {{fd|0.25}} seconds|Estimated}}, each part firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the primary bolt's trajectory from a location 55 units in front of the primary bolt's final location, both dealing the same damage and applying the same {{tip|slow}} to the first enemy they hit.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vel'Koz fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that collides with the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage and slowing them by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration. Plasma Fission can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the bolt is in flight, and does so automatically after the bolt reaches maximum range or collides with an enemy.
Recast: Vel'Koz splits the bolt in half over 0.25 seconds, each part firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the primary bolt's trajectory from a location 55 units in front of the primary bolt's final location, both dealing the same damage and applying the same slow to the first enemy they hit.
Plasma Fission restores mana per target killed.
leveling: {{st|Mana Restore per Kill|{{as|{{ap|20 to 30}}|mana}}|Maximum Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|20*3 to 30*3}}|mana}}}}
skills.notes:
* The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** Detonating the ability manually does not.
* An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a {{tip|spell shield}}.
* ''Plasma Fission'' can reach a maximum 1595 units diagonally (ignoring the split missile's width and enemy hitbox radius), reaching this distance after a total of about ~{{fd|1.65}} seconds.
* ''Plasma Fission'' will fire from wherever '''Vel'Koz''' is at the end of the cast time.

skills.name: Void Rift
skills.range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|1105|Ripple missile range}} / {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|1105|Rift collapse distance}} / {{tt|-95|Rift collapsing backwards distance}}
skills.blurb: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vel'Koz''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Void Rift'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' conjures a ripple which, after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, opens a rift to the void, cutting through the ground in a line in the target direction over {{fd|0.65}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path and leaving behind a rift.
After {{tt|{{fd|0.75}} seconds|Estimated}}, the rift violently collapses, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within and granting {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a Void Rift charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Active: Vel'Koz conjures a ripple which, after 0.25 seconds, opens a rift to the void, cutting through the ground in a line in the target direction over 0.65 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path and leaving behind a rift.
After 0.75 seconds, the rift violently collapses, dealing magic damage to enemies within and granting sight of the surrounding area for 0.25 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Detonation Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 165}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|30+45 to 110+165}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block the ripple and prevent the rift from forming further, but they will not destroy the section that was created already.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks one instance of damage.

effects.str: • Initial Magic Damage: (+ 15% AP)

skills.name: Tectonic Disruption
skills.blurb: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' hurls a disruptive anomaly that lands at the target location {{tt|after {{fd|0.75}} seconds|After cast start, estimated}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, as well as granting {{tip|sight}} of the area briefly.
If ''Tectonic Disruption'' is cast in close proximity of '''Vel'Koz''', the anomaly will also slightly {{tip|airborne|knock back}} enemies struck in the direction of the cast.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that lands at the target location after 0.75 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and knocking them up and stunning them for 0.75 seconds, as well as granting sight of the area briefly.
If Tectonic Disruption is cast in close proximity of Vel'Koz, the anomaly will also slightly knock back enemies struck in the direction of the cast.
skills.notes:
* The required proximity for the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} is relative to '''Vel'Koz's''' position when casting and not his current one.
* While the effect is fully prevented by blocking the missile (e.g. with {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}), the missile may not be destroyed ''visually''.{{bug}}
* The area of effect indicator appears at the start of the cast time.
** It will persist even if the cast cancels (e.g. '''Vel'Koz''' dies before cast time completes) despite the projectile not firing.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will also resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.

skills.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
skills.blurb: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Researched:}} Applying 3 {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstruction}} stacks to enemy champions marks them as ''{{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz}}'' for 7 seconds. [[Basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and [[champion ability|ability]] hits refresh this duration.

{{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.2}}-second delay, '''Vel'Koz''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to  {{fd|2.6}} seconds, projecting an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the target direction. ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' can be recast after 1 second during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.

The ray deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within it every {{fd|0.2}} seconds, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 20%, lingering for 1 second. {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstruction}} is applied every {{fd|0.7}} seconds to enemies hit. {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} enemies take {{as|true damage}} instead.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Researched: Applying 3 Vel'Koz's Deconstruction stacks to enemy champions marks them as Vel'Koz's Researched for 7 seconds. Basic attacks on-hit and champion ability hits refresh this duration.
Active: After a 0.2-second delay, Vel'Koz channels for up to 2.6 seconds, projecting an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the target direction. Life Form Disintegration Ray can be recast after 1 second during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.
The ray deals magic damage to enemies within it every 0.2 seconds, and slows them by 20%, lingering for 1 second. Vel'Koz's Deconstruction is applied every 0.7 seconds to enemies hit. Vel'Koz's Researched enemies take true damage instead.
Recast: Vel'Koz ends Life Form Disintegration Ray.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Tick|{{ap|(450 to 800)*0.2/2.6|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125*0.2/2.6|round=2}}% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|450 to 800}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' direction updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of '''Vel'Koz''' to the other will not make him rotate instantly).
* '''Vel'Koz''' will {{tip|sight|reveal}} himself during the channel if there is an enemy champion nearby.
* The beam hits in a rectangular shape, intersecting with the edge of an enemy {{tip|gameplay radius}}.
** Because of this, the effect will hit enemies whose center location is to the sides and/or slightly behind Vel'Koz, as long as their radius intersects with the area.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Vel'Koz''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true, false, interrupts, interrupts, false}}
